string-array.name: tips_alexa
string-array.item: Try “Alexa, tell me a food joke”
Try “Alexa, how do I say please in Japanese?”
Try “Alexa, what is the best pizza near me?”
Try “Alexa, what is in the cinema today?”

string-array.name: tips_temi
string-array.item: Try “Hey temi, who is Albert Einstein”
Try “Hey temi, what is the capital of Russia?”

string-array.name: tips_dingdang
string-array.item: “叮当叮当， 今天的天气怎么？”
